ch.nolix.core.specification

Class Specification

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.specification.Specification
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimplePersistentSpecification, StandardSpecification, SubSpecification

    public abstract class Specification
extends java.lang.Object
    A specification can have: -1 header -an arbitrary number of attributes that are specifications themselves
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
